com.novartis.opensource.yada.plugin

Class ScriptPreprocessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novartis.opensource.yada.plugin.AbstractPreprocessor
      • com.novartis.opensource.yada.plugin.ScriptPreprocessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Preprocess

    public class ScriptPreprocessor
extends AbstractPreprocessor
    A java API enabling execution of pre-existing scripts, in pre-defined locations on the YADA server, as Preprocess plugins. For more information see Plugin Guide
    Author:
    David Varon

    • Method Detail

      • engage

        public YADARequest engage(YADARequest yadaReq)
                   throws YADAPluginException
        Enables the execution of a script stored in the YADA_BIN directory. To execute a script preprocessor plugin, pass preArgs, or just args the first argument being the name of the script executable, and the rest of the arguments those, in order, to pass to it. If YADARequest.getPreArgs() is not null and YADARequest.getPlugin() is null, then the plugin will be set to YADARequest.SCRIPT_PREPROCESSOR automatically.

        The script must return a JSON object with name/value pairs corresponding to YADARequest parameters. These name/value pairs are then marshaled into yadaReq, which is subsequently returned by the method.

        Specified by:
        engage in interface Preprocess
        Overrides:
        engage in class AbstractPreprocessor
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        Returns:
        a new and presumably modified YADARequest object
        Throws:
        YADAPluginException - when any error occurs during processing
        See Also:
        Bypass.engage(com.novartis.opensource.yada.YADARequest)
